revision.comment: /* Blacklisted Links Found on the Main Page */necessaryily -> necessarily ([[User_talk:Cyberpower678#necessaryily]])
revision.text: {{Talkheader}} {{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WikiProject Turkey|class=B|importance=low}} {{WikiProject Korea|class=B|importance=low}} {{WPAVIATION|class=B|A-Class=|Aircraft=y|Gliding=n|imageneeded=y|Rotorcraft=n|needs-infobox=n|Engines=n|Biography=n|Air-sports-task-force=n|Accident-task-force=n|Airports-project=n|Airlines-project=n|peer-review=n|b1=y|b2=y|b3=y|b4=y|b5=y}} {{MILHIST|class=B|b1=y|b2=y|b3=y|b4=y|b5=y|Aviation=y|Middle-Eastern=y}} }} ==Photos== Since neither of the photos are of the Hürkuş I am wondering if they shouldn't be removed from the article. - [[User:Ahunt|Ahunt]] ([[User talk:Ahunt|talk]]) 00:57, 22 August 2010 (UTC) :I can't see any reason to include images of aircraft that are not the aircraft described in the article, so I will remove these. - [[User:Ahunt|Ahunt]] ([[User talk:Ahunt|talk]]) 13:19, 22 August 2010 (UTC) ::It also turns out that the image of the KT-1 in flight was a copyright violation image taken from [http://www.tai.com.tr/prog.aspx?contentDefID=6&page=___Programs__NONE_____INTEGRATED%20AIRCRAFT%20SYSTEMS__NONE_____DESIGN%20&%20DEVELOPMENT%20PROGRAMS__NONE_____T.B.T.E.U.-HURKUS__PROGRAM__6 here]. it has been tagged on Commons. - [[User:Ahunt|Ahunt]] ([[User talk:Ahunt|talk]]) 13:45, 22 August 2010 (UTC) ==Copyright violation== Most of the original text in this article was copied word-for-word (including the poor English grammar) from [http://www.tai.com.tr/prog.aspx?contentDefID=6&page=___Programs__NONE_____INTEGRATED%20AIRCRAFT%20SYSTEMS__NONE_____DESIGN%20&%20DEVELOPMENT%20PROGRAMS__NONE_____T.B.T.E.U.-HURKUS__PROGRAM__6 TURKISH PRIMARY AND BASIC TRAINER AIRCRAFT - HURKUS] and [http://www.tai.com.tr/news.aspx?contentDefID=63 TAI'S TURKISH PRIMARY AND BASIC TRAINER AIRCRAFT (HURKUS) TO BE DISPLAYED AT 47TH PARIS AIR SHOW]. I have reworded it and referenced it to remove the copyright violation. - [[User:Ahunt|Ahunt]] ([[User talk:Ahunt|talk]]) 13:36, 22 August 2010 (UTC) ==Status== HURKUS IS A CONCEPTUAL DESIGN PROGRAM NOT AN AIRCRAFT YET; SO STOP CONVERTING IT TO A/C TEMPLATE [[User:Tolgagurcan|Tolgagurcan]] ([[User talk:Tolgagurcan|talk]]) 15:54, 22 August 2010 (UTC) :One, please don't type in all caps - that is considered ''shouting''. :Two, I don't know what you think you mean by "conceptual design", but an aircraaft article on WP covers aircraft in all stages of development, even aircraft that remained designs only. In this case, the aircraft is further along in development than being just a design, per [http://www.flightglobal.com/articles/2010/06/04/342815/microtecnica-selected-to-equip-turkeys-hurkus-trainer.html this source], with first flight expected in 2011. :Three, much of the text you've added to the article is a copyright violation, as it is taken whole from [http://www.tai.com.tr/prog.aspx?contentDefID=6 the company page], including the sub-standard English. :Please allow us to restore the "aircraft template" version of the page, or you may face sanctions for copyright violation. Thanks. - [[User:BilCat|BilCat]] ([[User talk:BilCat|talk]]) 16:22, 22 August 2010 (UTC) == Crew number? == Video from TAI shows a 'two seater'.--[[Special:Contributions/76.92.123.141|76.92.123.141]] ([[User talk:76.92.123.141|talk]]) 23:29, 1 March 2013 (UTC) :The specs say "Crew: one, Capacity: one passenger" which adds up to two seats. - [[User:Ahunt|Ahunt]] ([[User talk:Ahunt|talk]]) 13:11, 2 March 2013 (UTC) == Derivation of PC-21 as 4th-generation training a/c == I think there should be acknowledgement that the Hurkus derives an awful lot in terms of looks, characteristics and architecture from the PC-21. It would be interesting to include discussion on the merits of what could in effect be considered an armed PC-21 where the Swiss manufacturer is clearly hobbled by their laws in this regard. Either way, the fact that TAI are 'borrowing' heavily from Pilatus should be acknowledged. Stefan [[Special:Contributions/84.241.99.2|84.241.99.2]] ([[User talk:84.241.99.2|talk]]) 13:56, 13 February 2014 (UTC) :As per [[WP:V]] we need a reliable reference that says this to include it. - [[User:Ahunt|Ahunt]] ([[User talk:Ahunt|talk]]) 14:27, 13 February 2014 (UTC) In the press conferences this issue is enlightened. First of all a copy or a derivative aircraft cannot get its own licence. EACS will not give a licence. Secondly because of the aerodynamical requirements same class aircrafts must have similar looks. Pilatus PC21, Short tucano, super tucano etc all have single turboprop engine and similar configuration. But they do differ a lot in terms of cost, capabilities, avionics etc. This is just like saying: ''"hey, look! all of the washing machines look the same, they are cube shaped and they have cylindrical steel drums so they are the same or copy of each other."'' said test pilot Murat Özpala http://www.kokpit.aero/murat-ozpala-hurkus-testlerini-anlatti — Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[Special:Contributions/79.123.128.176|79.123.128.176]] ([[User talk:79.123.128.176|talk]]) 15:11, 9 April 2016 (UTC) == Blacklisted Links Found on the Main Page == Cyberbot II has detected that page contains external links that have either been globally or locally blacklisted. Links tend to be blacklisted because they have a history of being spammed, or are highly innappropriate for Wikipedia. This, however, doesn't necessarily mean it's spam, or not a good link. If the link is a good link, you may wish to request whitelisting by going to the [[MediaWiki talk:Spam-whitelist|request page for whitelisting]]. If you feel the link being caught by the blacklist is a false positive, or no longer needed on the blacklist, you may request the regex be removed or altered at the [[MediaWiki talk:Spam-blacklist|blacklist request page]]. If the link is blacklisted globally and you feel the above applies you may request to whitelist it using the before mentioned request page, or request its removal, or alteration, at the [[meta:Talk:Spam Blacklist|request page on meta]]. When requesting whitelisting, be sure to supply the link to be whitelisted and wrap the link in nowiki tags. The whitelisting process can take its time so once a request has been filled out, you may set the invisible parameter on the tag to true. Please be aware that the bot will replace removed tags, and will remove misplaced tags regularly. '''Below is a list of links that were found on the main page:''' *http://www.airforce-technology.com/projects/taihurkus/ *:''Triggered by \bairforce-technology\.com\b on the local blacklist'' If you would like me to provide more information on the talk page, contact [[User:Cyberpower678]] and ask him to program me with more info. From your friendly hard working bot.—[[User:Cyberbot II|cyberbot II]] [[User talk:Cyberbot II|Notify]]Online 12:35, 3 April 2014 (UTC) {{done|Resolved}} This issue has been resolved, and I have therefore removed the tag, if not already done. No further action is necessary.—[[User:Cyberbot II|cyberbot II]] [[User talk:Cyberbot II|Notify]]Online 22:08, 9 April 2014 (UTC) == External links modified == Hello fellow Wikipedians, I have just added archive links to {{plural:3|one external link|3 external links}} on [[TAI Hürkuş]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=702606585 my edit]. If necessary, add {{tlx|cbignore}} after the link to keep me from modifying it. Alternatively, you can add {{tlx|nobots|deny{{=}}InternetArchiveBot}} to keep me off the page altogether. I made the following changes: *Added archive https://web.archive.org/20110722123743/http://www.tai.com.tr/news.aspx?contentDefID=63 to http://www.tai.com.tr/news.aspx?contentDefID=63 *Added archive https://web.archive.org/20110722124028/http://www.tai.com.tr/press.aspx?contentDefID=35 to http://www.tai.com.tr/press.aspx?contentDefID=35 *Added archive https://web.archive.org/20091228060742/http://www.tai.com.tr:80/prog.aspx?contentDefID=6 to http://www.tai.com.tr/prog.aspx?contentDefID=6 When you have finished reviewing my changes, please set the ''checked'' parameter below to '''true''' to let others know. {{sourcecheck|checked=true}} Cheers.—[[User:Cyberbot II|cyberbot II]][[User talk:Cyberbot II|Talk to my owner]]:Online 16:51, 31 January 2016 (UTC) :{{Checked}} - [[User:Ahunt|Ahunt]] ([[User talk:Ahunt|talk]]) 20:31, 1 February 2016 (UTC)
